text: Jamshid Mashayekhi (, 26 November 1934 - 2 April 2019) was an Iranian actor. He was born in Tehran, Iran. Mashayekhi was known for his roles in The Cow, Kaiser, and in Adobe and Mirror. He appeared in the television series Hezar Dastan. Mashayekhi died on 2 April 2019 at a hospital in Tehran from pneumonia complicated by laryngeal cancer, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Celebrating 50-year acting career of Jamshid Mashayekhi, BBC Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from laryngeal cancer Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Jamshid Mashayekhi
